content.text:
Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term refers to an illustration facing the title page that is intended to establish the tone and entice the reader to begin the story?

A. Convoluted
B. Frontispiece
C. Preface
D. Omniscient

The term that refers to an illustration facing the title page that is intended to establish the tone and entice the reader to begin the story is:

B. Frontispiece

In the image provided, the illustration on the left page facing the title page on the right is indeed a frontispiece.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
